author.literal: AUTOBIOGRAPHIE D'Asou 'L FfiDA. Translated by Baron W. Macguckin de Slane. ABD EL-LATIF. Extracts de U Autobiographic. Translated by Baron W. Macguckin de Slane. KAMEL-ALTEVARYKH. Ibn el-Athir. Translated by J. T. Reinaud and C. F. Defremery. HISTOIRE DES ATABECS DE MOSUL.
